Hello, @.$3#$b#You must be surprised to see me out here.$0#$b#Well, I just wanted to get a better look at the stars.$0#$b#They are simply stunning tonight.$1"/pause 500/speak Kin "Plus, I feel safer leaving the woods when it is night-time.$0#$b#Humans are not usally out-and-about.$0#$b#Well...except for you, of course.$0"/pause 500/speak Kin "But you are...very different from other humans.$3#$b#Kind of like how I am very different from other axolotls.$3#$b#I like that we have that in common.$0"/pause 500/speak Kin "Maybe that is why it felt so easy to trust you.$0#$b#And I am still very glad that I did.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Kin 2/pause 1000/speak Kin "Just look at all of these stars...$0#$b#You know...when I was still residing in Axolotl Village, I would always look up to the stars at night.$0#$b#I do find them rather pretty, but that is not why I looked up to them.$3#$b#I guess..I did it in hopes of seeking answers.$3#$b#As if the stars could answer all of my burning questions...about me, about why I am the way that I am...$3#$b#I never did get any answers.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Kin 1/pause 1000/speak Kin "You always ask to learn more about why I left Axolotl Villager, right?$3#$b#Well, the reason why is simply the fault of my own.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Kin "You see, when I first came across the village, I was welcomed with open arms by all of the axolotls.$3#$b#Axolotls are always so kind and inviting, that much is true.$3#$b#But...I always had this strong feeling eating away at me...that I simply did not belong.$2#$b#No matter how hard I tried to fit in, I always had this feeling.$2#$b#It was painful and neverending.$2"/pause 500/speak Kin "Everything about me just stood out in a terrible way.$2#$b#My color, my inability to regrow limbs...$2#$b#I could not even communicate with the other axolotls.$2#$b#I tried speaking to them in English, the only language I know, but of course they could not understand.$2"/pause 500/speak Kin "I ended up isolating myself from the rest of the village.$2#$b#I did not want to burden them with my strangeness.$2#$b#They tried to keep me included, but I kept refusing.$2"/pause 500/speak Kin "And eventually... I just left.$2#$b#I was a worthless member of their society, after all.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Kin "For the longest time, I feared that I made a mistake leaving the village.$2#$b#But...that was before I made a genuine friend.$3#$b#After becoming so close with you, I now believe that I made the right decision.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/emote Kin 32/pause 500/speak Kin "Thank you for always being so kind to me, @.$0#$b#And thank you for...always listening to me blab on, hehe.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Kin 2/pause 1000/speak Kin "Let us look at the stars together, @.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/end
